testcase.name: Validate Free CRM Home Page Test
testcase.system-out: Given user opens browser....................................................passed Then user is on Login Page..................................................passed Then user verify header.....................................................passed Then user enters username and password and clicks on login button...........passed Then Home Page is Displayed.................................................passed Then User switch to main frame..............................................passed Then user go to contacts and clicks on new contacts.........................passed Then user add contacts details..............................................passed Then user save contact details..............................................passed Then user close browser.....................................................passed
